name: Mahjong Solitaire Free
description:
Mahjong Solitaire is a free mahjong game based on a classic Chinese game.(also known as Shanghai Mahjong, Taipei Mahjong, Kyodai, Mahjong Trails, or Shanghai mahjongg)

The goal is to remove all tiles from the board. You may remove only paired free tiles. The tile is free when there are no tiles either to the left or to the right from it.
If you cannot find any pairs you may shuffle the tiles at any times, but you will get a time penalty.

Features
- 150 board layouts.
- 6 backgrounds.
- 3 tile art.
- shuffle, hint
- auto save
- block shadow
- auto zoom in

Enjoy!
